casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Johnny Dwayne HILL. No. 06-1218. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State of NC. James R. Glover, for Hill. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 647 S.E.2d 475 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Attorney General on the 23rd day of August 2007 for Writ of Supersedeas and Motion for Temporary Stay of the judgment of the Court of Appeals in this matter, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd day of August 2007."
